name: South Asian Hospitality Services Pvt. Ltd
overview:
South Asian Hospitality Services Pvt. Ltd (SAHSPL) is a restaurant management company started in 2002 by Ms. Bela Juneja and Mr. Parvin Juneja with a dedicated team of professionals. SAHSPL manages national and international food brand restaurants in India. The company has the Master Franchise of international brands like – Muffin Break (Australia), RITA’s Italian Ice-cream and Round Table Pizza (USA). Apart from these franchises of international brands; SAHSPL is currently operating over 48 restaurants and food courts in 14 cities across the country. SAHSPL has presence in Delhi/NCR, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Uttar Pradesh, Punjab, Haryana, Chandigarh, Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan, Chhattisgarh, Ahmedabad and Pune. The corporate office is located in Delhi with training centres located in Delhi, Punjab, Uttar Pradesh and Mumbai.

The company guides mall owners, office locations to decide the correct mix of food brands which can be operational in that particular area. Backed by a powerful survey, SAHSPL also helps the mall owners to maximize the use of space available by deciding the exact location of the restaurants. The USP of SAHSPL is the experience in deciding the place exact location well in advance which is cost beneficial in terms of real estate costs.

It gives out franchises and sub-franchises to potential clients on a national and international level. The restaurant management company offers intensive services regarding setting up of the entire restaurant once the franchise owner signs a deal with it. SAHSPL is planning to open 50 more restaurants in the coming year.
